comments:
HI
     I work in IBM WorkPlace Designer.We just upgraded to WTP1.5,eclipe3.2,emf 2.2 and gef 3.2 and xsd 2.2.We are planning to have a updateSite for WorkPlace Designer. For that, we have WST features. We figured out 2 problems.

1) The feature.xml in some of the WST features 
eg. org.eclipse.wst.xml_core.feature_1.0.0.jar
requires eclipse 3.1 plugins like 
<requires>
      <import feature="org.apache.xerces.feature" version="2.7.0" match="equivalent"/>
      <import feature="org.eclipse.rcp" version="3.1.1" match="equivalent"/>
      <import feature="org.eclipse.platform" version="3.1.1" match="equivalent"/>
      <import feature="org.eclipse.emf" version="2.1.1" match="equivalent"/>
      <import feature="org.eclipse.wst.common_core.feature" version="1.0.0" match="equivalent"/>
      <import feature="org.eclipse.xsd" version="2.1.1" match="equivalent"/>
   </requires>

Now since the match="equivalent". The update Manager fails to find the eclipse/gef/emf features which have a higher number. 

Changing the match= greaterOrEqual works. But for that we have to change the feature.xml for quite  a few wst plugins.


2) AFter these changes  have been done, suppose if i launch my Eclipse 3.2, Help -> FInd and Manage,and say my updateSite is  an archived site point there , the updateManager fails.

Seems like the UpdateManager does not like the naming convention of some of the plugins.Like this for eg.the second underscore _0325.jar. 
org.eclipse.wst.common.snippets_1.0.100.v20060112_0325.jar. 

It tries to look for the plugin 
org.eclipse.wst.common.snippets_1.0.100.v20060112-0325.jar, which  does not exists and stops. Even if the feature.xml references a plugin by name 
org.eclipse.wst.common.snippets_1.0.100.v20060112_0325.jar.

This is a case for all the plugins that have the naming convention similar to above

org.eclipse.wst.css.core_1.0.100.v20060112_0325.jar
org.eclipse.wst.css.ui_1.0.100.v20060112_0325.jar etc.

This is a exception i see in the logs,

!ENTRY org.eclipse.update.core 4 0 2006-02-16 12:29:56.136
!MESSAGE Unable to retrieve remote reference "jar:file:C:/temp/temp2/designersite.zip!/plugins/org.eclipse.wst.common.snippets_1.0.100.v20060112-0325.jar". [JAR entry plugins/org.eclipse.wst.common.snippets_1.0.100.v20060112-0325.jar not found in C:\temp\temp2\designersite.zip]
!STACK 0
java.io.FileNotFoundException: JAR entry plugins/org.eclipse.wst.common.snippets_1.0.100.v20060112-0325.jar not found in C:\temp\temp2\designersite.zip
	at sun.net.www.protocol.jar.JarURLConnection.connect(JarURLConnection.java:97)
	at sun.net.www.protocol.jar.JarURLConnection.getInputStream(JarURLConnection.java:107)
	at org.eclipse.update.internal.core.connection.OtherResponse.getInputStream(OtherResponse.java:35)
	at org.eclipse.update.core.ContentReference.getInputStream(ContentReference.java:154)
	at org.eclipse.update.core.FeatureContentProvider.asLocalReference(FeatureContentProvider.java:247)
	at org.eclipse.update.internal.core.FeaturePackagedContentProvider.getPluginEntryArchiveReferences(FeaturePackagedContentProvider.java:165)
	at org.eclipse.update.internal.operations.UpdateUtils.downloadFeatureContent(UpdateUtils.java:627)
	at org.eclipse.update.internal.operations.UpdateUtils.downloadFeatureContent(UpdateUtils.java:653)
	at org.eclipse.update.internal.ui.wizards.InstallWizard2.download(InstallWizard2.java:408)
	at org.eclipse.update.internal.ui.wizards.InstallWizard2.access$3(InstallWizard2.java:397)
	at org.eclipse.update.internal.ui.wizards.InstallWizard2$3.run(InstallWizard2.java:350)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.jobs.Worker.run(Worker.java:58)

CHanging the second _ to a - works though. But for that we would have to change for around 15-20 plugins, and when we get the next Milestone build, do this again. Can u please take a look at that ?

Thanks
-ak
David, Can you please fix this? Thx.
Afaik, this is no longuer an issue and was solved in 3.2.0 of eclipse.
This is part of a "mass update" where bugs showing "fixed" between 7/1/2006 and 9/27/2006 are assumed fixed in WTP 1.5.1. feel free to change the target milestone if you know a more accurate setting.
Closing as resolved since 1.5.1.  If this bug should not be closed, please reopen.

traces.message: JAR entry plugins/org.eclipse.wst.common.snippets_1.0.100.v20060112-0325.jar not found in C:\temp\temp2\designersite.zip
